title: Hydraulic Pump Maintenance
text: To inspect the hydraulic pump, first isolate power. Remove the cover and inspect seals. Common failure modes: seal_wear, bearing_fault. Procedure: replace_seal, lubricate_bearing.

title: Valve Replacement Procedure
text: Shut off upstream pressure. Remove bonnet. Replace valve seat if corroded. Failure modes include seat_erosion. Procedure: replace_seat, torque_bonnet.

title: Compressor Troubleshooting
text: Check oil level. Inspect belts for wear. Failure modes: belt_break, oil_leak. Procedure: replace_belt, refill_oil.
